original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Iddhibalavagga
analyzed: iddhi bala vagga

original: 6. Gabbhāvakkantipañha
analyzed: gabbha avakkanti pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘tiṇṇaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti, idha mātāpitaro
analyzed: tiṇṇam kho pana bhikkhave sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti idha mātā pitaro

original: ca sannipatitā honti, mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti, imesaṁ
analyzed: ca sannipatitāḥ honti mātā ca utunī hoti gandhabbaḥ ca paccupaṭṭhitaḥ hoti imesa

original: kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī’ti, asesavacanametaṁ, nissesavacanametaṁ,
analyzed: kho bhikkhave tiṇṇam sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti iti asesa vacanam eta nissesa vacanam eta

original: nippariyāyavacanametaṁ, arahassavacanametaṁ, sadevamanussānaṁ majjhe nisīditvā bhaṇitaṁ,
analyzed: nippariyāya vacanam eta arahassa vacanam eta sa deva manussānam majjhe nisīditvā bhaṇita

original: ayañca dvinnaṁ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti dissati, dukūlena tāpasena pārikāya
analyzed: ayam ca dvinnam sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti dissati dukūlena tāpasena pārikāya

original: tāpasiyā utunikāle dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhi parāmaṭṭhā, tassa tena nābhiparāmasanena
analyzed: tāpasiyāḥ utu nikāle dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhi parāmaṭṭhā tassa tena nābhi parāmasanena

original: sāmakumāro nibbatto.
analyzed: sāma kumāraḥ nibbattaḥ

original: Mātaṅgenāpi isinā brāhmaṇakaññāya utunikāle dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhi parāmaṭṭhā, tassa tena nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyo nāma māṇavako nibbattoti.
analyzed: mātaṅgena api isinā brāhmaṇa kaññāya utu nikāle dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhi parāmaṭṭhā tassa tena nābhi parāmasanena maṇḍabyaḥ nāma māṇavakaḥ nibbattaḥ ti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘tiṇṇaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī’ti.
analyzed: tiṇṇam kho pana bhikkhave sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti iti

original: Tena hi sāmo ca kumāro maṇḍabyo ca māṇavako ubhopi te nābhiparāmasanena nibbattāti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: tena hi sāmaḥ ca kumāraḥ maṇḍabyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ ubho api te na abhiparāmasanena yam tam micchā

original: Yadi, bhante, tathāgatena bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante tathāgatena bhaṇita

original: ‘sāmo ca kumāro maṇḍabyo ca māṇavako nābhiparāmasanena nibbattā’ti, tena hi ‘tiṇṇaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, tampi micchā.
analyzed: sāmaḥ ca kumāraḥ maṇḍabyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ nābhiparāmasanena nibbattā ati tena hi tiṇṇam kho pana bhikkhave sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti iti yam tam pi micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sugambhīro sunipuṇo visayo buddhimantānaṁ, so tavānuppatto, chinda vimatipathaṁ, dhārehi ñāṇavarappajjotan”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭiko pañho su gambhīraḥ su nipuṇaḥ visayaḥ so tava anuppatto chinda vimati patha dhārehi ñāṇa vara ppajjotanti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘tiṇṇaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassa
analyzed: bhāsitam peta mahā rāja bhagavatā tiṇṇam kho pana bhikkhave sannipātāḥ gabbhassa

original: avakkanti hoti, idha mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā honti, mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo
analyzed: avakkanti hoti idha mātā pitaro ca sannipatitāḥ honti mātā ca utunī hoti gandhabbo

original: ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti, evaṁ tiṇṇaṁ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī’ti.
analyzed: ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti evam tiṇṇam sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti iti

original: Bhaṇitañca—
analyzed: bhaṇitam ca

original: ‘sāmo ca kumāro maṇḍabyo ca māṇavako nābhiparāmasanena nibbattā’”ti.
analyzed: sāmaḥ ca kumāraḥ maṇḍabyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ nābhiparāmasanena nibbattā ati

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, yena kāraṇena pañho suvinicchito hoti, tena kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena yena kāraṇena pañhaḥ su vinicchitaḥ hoti tena kāraṇena mama saññāpehi iti

original: “Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, saṅkicco ca kumāro isisiṅgo ca tāpaso thero ca kumārakassapo iminā nāma te nibbattā”ti?
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja saṅkiccaḥ ca kumāraḥ isisiṅgaḥ ca tāpasaḥ theraḥ ca kumārakassapaḥ iminā nāma te nibbattā ati

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggatā tesaṁ jāti, dve migadhenuyo tāva utunikāle dvinnaṁ
analyzed: āma bhante abbhuggatā tesam jāti dve migadhenuyo utu nikāle

original: tāpasānaṁ passāvaṭṭhānaṁ āgantvā sasambhavaṁ passāvaṁ piviṁsu, tena passāvasambhavena
analyzed: tāpasānam passāva ṭṭhānam āgantvā sa sambhavam passāvam tena passāva sambhavena

original: saṅkicco ca kumāro isisiṅgo ca tāpaso nibbattā.
analyzed: saṅkiccaḥ ca kumāraḥ isisiṅgaḥ ca tāpasaḥ nibbattā

original: Therassa udāyissa bhikkhunupassayaṁ upagatassa rattacittena bhikkhuniyā aṅgajātaṁ upanijjhāyantassa sambhavaṁ kāsāve mucci.
analyzed: therassa udāyissa bhikkhuni passayam upagatassa ratta cittena bhikkhuniyāḥ aṅga jātam upanijjhāyantassa sambhavam kāsāve mucci

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyi taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyi tam bhikkhunim etat avoca

original: ‘gaccha bhagini, udakaṁ āhara antaravāsakaṁ dhovissāmī’ti.
analyzed: gaccha bhagini udakam āhara antaravāsakam dhovissāmi iti

original: ‘Āharayya, ahameva dhovissāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham eva dhovissāmi iti

original: Tato sā bhikkhunī utunisamaye taṁ sambhavaṁ ekadesaṁ mukhena aggahesi, ekadesaṁ aṅgajāte pakkhipi, tena thero kumārakassapo nibbattoti etaṁ jano āhā”ti.
analyzed: tatas sā bhikkhunī utuni samaye tam sambhavam eka desam mukhena aggahesi eka desam aṅga jāte pakkhipi tena theraḥ kumārakassapaḥ nibbattaḥ ti etam janaḥ āha ati

original: “Api nu kho tvaṁ, mahārāja, saddahasi taṁ vacanan”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu tva mahā rāja saddahasi tam

original: “Āma, bhante, balavaṁ tattha mayaṁ kāraṇaṁ upalabhāma, yena mayaṁ kāraṇena saddahāma iminā kāraṇena nibbattā”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante balavam tattha mayam kāraṇam upalabhāma yena mayam kāraṇena saddahāma iminā kāraṇena nibbattā ati

original: “Kiṁ panettha, mahārāja, kāraṇan”ti?
analyzed: kim pana itthā mahā rāja

original: “Suparikammakate, bhante, kalale bījaṁ nipatitvā khippaṁ saṁviruhatī”ti.
analyzed: su parikammakate bhante kalale bījam nipatitvā khippam sa viruhati iti

original: “Āma, mahārājā”ti.
analyzed: āma mahārāja ati

original: “Evameva kho, bhante, sā bhikkhunī utunī samānā saṇṭhite kalale ruhire pacchinnavege
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante sā bhikkhunī utunī samānā saṇṭhite kalale ruhire pacchinna vege

original: ṭhitāya dhātuyā taṁ sambhavaṁ gahetvā tasmiṁ kalale pakkhipi, tena tassā gabbho saṇṭhāsi,
analyzed: ṭhitāya dhātuyā tam sambhavam gahetvā tasmin kalale pakkhipi tena tassā gabbhaḥ saṇṭhāsi

original: evaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ paccema tesaṁ nibbattiyā”ti.
analyzed: evam tattha kāraṇam paccema tesam nibbattiyā ti

original: “Evametaṁ, mahārāja, tathā sampaṭicchāmi, yonippavesena gabbho sambhavatīti.
analyzed: evam eta mahā rāja tathā sampaṭicchāmi yoni ppavesena gabbhaḥ sambhavati iti

original: Sampaṭicchasi pana, tvaṁ, mahārāja, therassa kumārakassapassa gabbhāvakkamanan”ti?
analyzed: sampaṭicchasi pana tva mahā rāja therassa kumārakassapassa gabbhāvakkamanam ti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Sādhu, mahārāja, paccāgatosi mama visayaṁ, ekavidhenapi gabbhāvakkantiṁ kathayanto
analyzed: sādhu mahā rāja paccāgataḥ asi mama visaye ekavidhena api gabbha avakkantim kathayantaḥ

original: mamānubalaṁ bhavissasi, atha yā pana tā dve migadhenuyo passāvaṁ pivitvā gabbhaṁ
analyzed: mama anubalam bhavissasi atha yā pana tā dve migadhenuyo passāvam pivitvā gabbha

original: paṭilabhiṁsu, tāsaṁ tvaṁ saddahasi gabbhassāvakkamanan”ti?
analyzed: tāsam tvam saddahasi

original: “Āma, bhante, yaṁ kiñci bhuttaṁ pītaṁ khāyitaṁ lehitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ kalalaṁ osarati, ṭhānagataṁ vuḍḍhimāpajjati.
analyzed: āma bhante yam kiñci bhuttam pītam khāyitam lehita sabbam tam kalalam osarati ṭhāna gatam vuḍḍhim āpajjati

original: Yathā, bhante nāgasena, yā kāci saritā nāma, sabbā tā mahāsamuddaṁ osaranti, ṭhānagatā vuḍḍhimāpajjanti.
analyzed: yathā bhante nāgasena yā kāci saritā nāma sabbā tāḥ mahā samuddam osaranti ṭhāna gatāḥ vuḍḍhim āpajjanti

original: Evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, yaṁ kiñci bhuttaṁ pītaṁ khāyitaṁ lehitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena yam kiñci bhuttam pītam khāyitam lehita sabbam

original: kalalaṁ osarati, ṭhānagataṁ vuḍḍhimāpajjati, tenāhaṁ kāraṇena saddahāmi mukhagatenapi
analyzed: kalalam osarati ṭhāna gatam vuḍḍhim āpajjati tena aham kāraṇena saddahāmi mukha gatena api

original: gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti.
analyzed: gabbhassa avakkanti hoti iti

original: “Sādhu, mahārāja, gāḷhataraṁ upagatosi mama visayaṁ, mukhapānenapi dvayasannipāto bhavati.
analyzed: sādhu mahā rāja gāḍhataram upagataḥ asi mama mukha pānena api dvaya sannipātaḥ bhavati

original: Saṅkiccassa ca, mahārāja, kumārassa isisiṅgassa ca tāpasassa therassa ca kumārakassapassa gabbhāvakkamanaṁ sampaṭicchasī”ti?
analyzed: saṅkiccassa ca mahā rāja kumārassa isisiṅgassa ca tāpasassa therassa ca kumārakassapassa gabbha avakkamanam sampaṭicchasi iti

original: “Āma, bhante, sannipāto osaratī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante sannipātaḥ osarati iti

original: “Sāmopi, mahārāja, kumāro maṇḍabyopi māṇavako tīsu sannipātesu antogadhā, ekarasāyeva purimena, tattha kāraṇaṁ vakkhāmi.
analyzed: sāmaḥ api mahā rāja kumāraḥ maṇḍabyaḥ api māṇavakaḥ tīsu sannipātesu antogadhā eka rasāya iva purimena tattha kāraṇam vakkhāmi

original: Dukūlo ca, mahārāja, tāpaso pārikā ca tāpasī ubhopi te araññavāsā ahesuṁ pavivekādhimuttā uttamatthagavesakā, tapatejena yāva brahmalokaṁ santāpesuṁ.
analyzed: dukūlo ca mahā rāja tāpaso pārikā ca tāpasī ubho pi te arañña vāsāḥ ahesum pa viveka adhimuttāḥ uttama attha gavesakā tapa tejena yāva brahma lokam santāpesu

original: Tesaṁ tadā sakko devānamindo sāyaṁ pātaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ āgacchati.
analyzed: tesam tadā sakkaḥ devānamindo sāyam pātam upaṭṭhānam āgacchati

original: So tesaṁ garukatamettatāya upadhārento addasa anāgatamaddhāne dvinnampi tesaṁ cakkhūnaṁ antaradhānaṁ, disvā te evamāha—
analyzed: saḥ tesam garukata metta tāya upadhārentaḥ addasa dvinnam pi tesam cakkhūnam disvā te evam āha

original: ‘ekaṁ me, bhonto, vacanaṁ karotha, sādhu ekaṁ puttaṁ janeyyātha, so tumhākaṁ upaṭṭhāko bhavissati ālambano cā’ti.
analyzed: ekam me bhontaḥ vacanam karotha sādhu ekam puttam janeyyātha saḥ tumhākam upaṭṭhākaḥ bhavissati ālambanaḥ ca ati

original: ‘Alaṁ, kosiya, mā evaṁ bhaṇī’ti.
analyzed: ala kosiya mā evam bhaṇi iti

original: Te tassa taṁ vacanaṁ na sampaṭicchiṁsu.
analyzed: te tassa tam vacanam na

original: Anukampako atthakāmo sakko devānamindo dutiyampi …
analyzed: anukampakaḥ attha kāmo sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ dutiyam pi

original: tatiyampi te evamāha—
analyzed: tatiyam pi te evam āha

original: ‘ekaṁ me, bhonto, vacanaṁ karotha, sādhu ekaṁ puttaṁ janeyyātha, so tumhākaṁ upaṭṭhāko bhavissati ālambano cā’ti.
analyzed: ekam me bhontaḥ vacanam karotha sādhu ekam puttam janeyyātha saḥ tumhākam upaṭṭhākaḥ bhavissati ālambanaḥ ca ati

original: Tatiyampi te āhaṁsu ‘alaṁ, kosiya, mā tvaṁ kho amhe anatthe niyojehi, kadāyaṁ kāyo
analyzed: tatiyam pi te āhasu ala kosiya mā tvam kho amhe anatthe niyojehi kadā ayam kāyo

original: na bhijjissati, bhijjatu ayaṁ kāyo bhedanadhammo, bhijjantiyāpi dharaṇiyā patantepi
analyzed: na bhijjissati bhijjatu ayam kāyaḥ bhedana dhammo bhijjantiyā api dharaṇiyā patante pi

original: selasikhare phalantepi ākāse patantepi candimasūriye neva mayaṁ lokadhammehi missayissāma,
analyzed: sela sikhare phalante api ākāse patante api candima sūriye na iva mayam loka dhammehi missayissāma

original: mā tvaṁ amhākaṁ sammukhabhāvaṁ upagaccha, upagatassa te eso vissāso, anatthacaro tvaṁ maññe’ti.
analyzed: mā tvam amhākam sammukha bhāvam upagaccha upagatassa te esaḥ vissāsaḥ anattha caraḥ tvam maññā iti

original: Tato sakko devānamindo tesaṁ manaṁ alabhamāno garukato pañjaliko puna yāci—
analyzed: tatas sakkaḥ devānamindo tesam manam a labhamānaḥ garu kataḥ pañjalikaḥ puna yāci

original: ‘yadi me vacanaṁ na ussahatha kātuṁ, yadā tāpasī utunī hoti pupphavatī, tadā tvaṁ,
analyzed: yadi me vacanam na ussahatha yadā tāpasī utunī hoti pupphavatī tadā tva

original: bhante, dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhiṁ parāmaseyyāsi, tena sā gabbhaṁ lacchati,
analyzed: bhante dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena nābhim parāmaseyyāsi tena sā gabbham lacchati

original: sannipāto yevesa gabbhāvakkantiyā’ti.
analyzed: sannipātaḥ yā iva īsa gabbha avakkantiyā ati

original: ‘Sakkomahaṁ, kosiya, taṁ vacanaṁ kātuṁ, na tāvatakena amhākaṁ tapo bhijjati, hotū’ti—
analyzed: sakkomaha kosiya tam vacanam kātu na tāvatakena amhākam tapaḥ bhijjati hotu uti

original: sampaṭicchiṁsu.
analyzed: sampaṭicchisu

original: Tāya ca pana velāya devabhavane atthi devaputto ussannakusalamūlo khīṇāyuko āyukkhayappatto yadicchakaṁ samattho okkamituṁ api cakkavattikulepi.
analyzed: tāya ca pana velāya deva bhavane atthi deva putto ussanna kusala mūlaḥ khīṇa āyukaḥ āyu khaya ppatto yad icchakam samatthaḥ okkamitum api cakkavatti kule pi

original: Atha sakko devānamindo taṁ devaputtaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha—
analyzed: atha sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ tam deva puttam upasaṅkamitvā evam āha

original: ‘ehi kho, mārisa, supabhāto te divaso, atthasiddhi upagatā, yamahaṁ te upaṭṭhānamāgamiṁ,
analyzed: ehi kho mārisa supabhātaḥ te divasaḥ attha siddhi upagatā yam aham te upaṭṭhānam āgami

original: ramaṇīye te okāse vāso bhavissati, patirūpe kule paṭisandhi bhavissati, sundarehi
analyzed: ramaṇīye te okāse vāsaḥ bhavissati patirūpe kule paṭisandhi bhavissati sundarehi

original: mātāpitūhi vaḍḍhetabbo, ehi me vacanaṁ karohī’ti yāci.
analyzed: mātā pitūhi vaḍḍhetabbaḥ ehi me vacanam karohi iti yāci

original: Dutiyampi …
analyzed: dutiyam pi

original: tatiyampi yāci sirasi pañjalikato.
analyzed: yāci sirasi

original: Tato so devaputto evamāha—
analyzed: tatas saḥ deva putto evam āha

original: ‘katamaṁ taṁ, mārisa, kulaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ kittayasi punappunan’ti.
analyzed: katamam te mārisa kula yam tvam abhikkhaṇam kittayasi punappunanti

original: ‘Dukūlo ca tāpaso pārikā ca tāpasī’ti.
analyzed: dukūlaḥ ca tāpasaḥ pārikā ca tāpasī iti

original: So tassa vacanaṁ sutvā tuṭṭho sampaṭicchi ‘sādhu, mārisa, yo tava chando, so hotu,
analyzed: so tassa vacanam sutvā tuṭṭhaḥ sampaṭicchi sādhu mārisa yaḥ tava chandaḥ saḥ hotu

original: ākaṅkhamāno ahaṁ, mārisa, patthite kule uppajjeyyaṁ, kimhi kule uppajjāmi aṇḍaje
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ aha mārisa patthite kule uppajjeyya kimhi kule uppajjāmi aṇḍa je

original: vā jalābuje vā saṁsedaje vā opapātike vā’ti?
analyzed: vā jalābu je vā sa seda je vā opapātike vāti

original: ‘Jalābujāya, mārisa, yoniyā uppajjāhī’ti.
analyzed: jalābu jāya mārisa yoniyā uppajjāhi iti

original: Atha sakko devānamindo uppattidivasaṁ vigaṇetvā dukūlassa tāpasassa ārocesi ‘asukasmiṁ
analyzed: atha sakkaḥ devānamindo uppatti divasam vigaṇetvā dukūlassa tāpasassa ārocesi asukasmi

original: nāma divase tāpasī utunī bhavissati pupphavatī, tadā tvaṁ, bhante, dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena
analyzed: nāma divase tāpasī utunī bhavissati pupphavatī tadā tva bhante dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena

original: nābhiṁ parāmaseyyāsī’ti.
analyzed: nābhim parāmaseyya asi iti

original: Tasmiṁ, mahārāja, divase tāpasī ca utunī pupphavatī ahosi, devaputto ca tatthūpago
analyzed: tasmi mahā rāja divase tāpasī ca utunī pupphavatī ahosi deva putto ca tatthu upago

original: paccupaṭṭhito ahosi, tāpaso ca dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena tāpasiyā nābhiṁ parāmasi,
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhitaḥ ahosi tāpaso ca dakkhiṇena hatthaṅguṭṭhena tāpasiyāḥ nābhim parāmasi

original: iti te tayo sannipātā ahesuṁ, nābhiparāmasanena tāpasiyā rāgo udapādi, so panassā
analyzed: iti te tayo sannipātāḥ ahesu nābhi parāmasanena tāpasiyā rāgaḥ udapādi saḥ panassā

original: rāgo nābhiparāmasanaṁ paṭicca mā tvaṁ sannipātaṁ ajjhācārameva maññi, ūhasanampi
analyzed: rāgaḥ na abhiparāmasanam paṭicca mā tvam sannipātam ajjhācāram eva maññi

original: sannipāto, ullapanampi sannipāto, upanijjhāyanampi sannipāto, pubbabhāgabhāvato rāgassa
analyzed: sannipātaḥ ullapanam pi sannipātaḥ upanijjhāyanam pi sannipātaḥ pubbabhāga bhāvataḥ rāgassa

original: uppādāya āmasanena sannipāto jāyati, sannipātā okkamanaṁ hotīti.
analyzed: uppādāya āmasanena sannipātaḥ jāyati sannipātāya okkamanam hoti iti

original: Anajjhācārepi, mahārāja, parāmasanena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: an ajjhācāre pi mahā rāja parāmasanena gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, aggi jalamāno aparāmasanopi upagatassa sītaṁ byapahanti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja aggi jalamānaḥ aparāmasanaḥ api upagatassa sītam byapahanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, anajjhācārepi parāmasanena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja an ajjhācāre pi parāmasanena gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Catunnaṁ, mahārāja, vasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti kammavasena yonivasena kulavasena āyācanavasena, api ca sabbepete sattā kammasambhavā kammasamuṭṭhānā.
analyzed: sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti kamma vasena yoni vasena kula vasena āyācana vasena api ca sabbe pete sattā kamma sambhavā kamma samuṭṭhānā

original: Kathaṁ, mahārāja, kammavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti?
analyzed: katha mahā rāja kamma vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Ussannakusalamūlā, mahārāja, sattā yadicchakaṁ uppajjanti khattiyamahāsālakule vā
analyzed: ussanna kusala mūlāḥ mahā rāja sattāḥ yadicchakam uppajjanti khattiya mahāsāla kule vā

original: brāhmaṇamahāsālakule vā gahapatimahāsālakule vā devesu vā aṇḍajāya vā yoniyā jalābujāya
analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahā sāla kule vā gahapati mahā sāla kule vā devesu vā aṇḍa jāya vā yoniyā jalābu jāya

original: vā yoniyā saṁsedajāya vā yoniyā opapātikāya vā yoniyā.
analyzed: vā yoniyā saseda jāya vā yoniyā opapātikāya vā yoniyā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo pahūtajātarūparajato pahūtavittūpakaraṇo
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ aḍḍhaḥ mahat dhanaḥ mahā bhogaḥ pahūta jātarūpa rajataḥ pahūta vittu upakaraṇaḥ

original: pahūtadhanadhañño pahūtañātipakkho dāsiṁ vā dāsaṁ vā khettaṁ vā vatthuṁ vā gāmaṁ
analyzed: pahūta dhana dhaññaḥ pahūta ñāti pakkhaḥ dāsim vā dāsam vā khettam vā vatthum vā gāma

original: vā nigamaṁ vā janapadaṁ vā yaṁ kiñci manasā abhipatthitaṁ, yadicchakaṁ dviguṇatiguṇampi
analyzed: vā nigamam vā janapadam vā yam kiñci manasā yadicchakam dviguṇa tiguṇam pi

original: dhanaṁ datvā kiṇāti;
analyzed: dhanam da tvā kiṇāti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, ussannakusalamūlā sattā yadicchakaṁ uppajjanti khattiyamahāsālakule
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ussanna kusala mūlā sattā yadicchakam uppajjanti khattiya mahāsāla kule

original: vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakule vā gahapatimahāsālakule vā devesu vā aṇḍajāya vā yoniyā jalābujāya
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇa mahā sāla kule vā gahapati mahā sāla kule vā devesu vā aṇḍa jāya vā yoniyā jalābu jāya

original: vā yoniyā saṁsedajāya vā yoniyā opapātikāya vā yoniyā.
analyzed: vā yoniyā saseda jāya vā yoniyā opapātikāya vā yoniyā

original: Evaṁ kammavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: evam kamma vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Kathaṁ yonivasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti?
analyzed: katham yoni vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Kukkuṭānaṁ, mahārāja, vātena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: mahā rāja vātena hoti

original: Balākānaṁ meghasaddena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: balākānam megha saddena gabbhāvakkantī hoti

original: Sabbepi devā agabbhaseyyakā sattāyeva, tesaṁ nānāvaṇṇena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: sabbe api devāḥ a gabbhaseyyakā sattāya iva tesam nānā vaṇṇena gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, manussā nānāvaṇṇena mahiyā caranti, keci purato paṭicchādenti, keci
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja manussāḥ nānā vaṇṇena mahiyā caranti keci puratas paṭicchādenti keci

original: pacchato paṭicchādenti, keci naggā honti, keci bhaṇḍū honti setapaṭadharā, keci moḷibaddhā
analyzed: pacchatas paṭicchādenti keci naggāḥ honti keci honti seta paṭa dharā keci moḷi baddhā

original: honti, keci bhaṇḍū kāsāvavasanā honti, keci kāsāvavasanā moḷibaddhā honti, keci jaṭino
analyzed: honti keci kāsāvavasanāḥ honti keci kāsāvavasanāḥ moḷibaddhāḥ honti keci jaṭinaḥ

original: vākacīradharā honti, keci cammavasanā honti, keci rasmiyo nivāsenti, sabbepete manussā
analyzed: vāka cīra dharāḥ honti keci camma vasanāḥ honti keci rasmiyaḥ nivāsenti sabbe pete manussā

original: nānāvaṇṇena mahiyā caranti;
analyzed: nānā vaṇṇena mahiyā caranti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sattāyeva te sabbe, tesaṁ nānāvaṇṇena gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sattāya iva te sabbe tesam nānā vaṇṇena gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Evaṁ yonivasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: evam yoni vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Kathaṁ kulavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti?
analyzed: katham kula vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Kulaṁ nāma, mahārāja, cattāri kulāni aṇḍajaṁ jalābujaṁ saṁsedajaṁ opapātikaṁ.
analyzed: kulam nāma mahā rāja cattāri kulāni aṇḍa jam jalābu jam sa seda jam opapātika

original: Yadi tattha gandhabbo yato kutoci āgantvā aṇḍaje kule uppajjati, so tattha aṇḍajo hoti …pe…
analyzed: yadi tattha gandhabbaḥ yatas kutoci āgantvā aṇḍa je kule uppajjati saḥ tattha aṇḍa jaḥ hoti pe

original: jalābuje kule …
analyzed: jalābu je kule

original: saṁsedaje kule …
analyzed: saset aje kule

original: opapātike kule uppajjati, so tattha opapātiko hoti.
analyzed: opapātike kule uppajjati so tattha opapātikaḥ hoti

original: Tesu tesu kulesu tādisāyeva sattā sambhavanti.
analyzed: tesu tesu kulesu tādisāya iva sattā sambhavanti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, himavati nerupabbataṁ ye keci migapakkhino upenti, sabbe te sakavaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā honti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja himavati neru pabbatam ye keci miga pakkhinaḥ upenti sabbe te saka vaṇṇam vijahitvā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇāḥ honti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci gandhabbo yato kutoci āgantvā aṇḍajaṁ yoniṁ upagantvā sabhāvavaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā aṇḍajo hoti …pe…
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yaḥ koci gandhabbaḥ yatas kutocid āgantvā aṇḍa jam yonim upagantvā sabhāva vaṇṇam vijahitvā aṇḍa jaḥ hoti pe

original: jalābujaṁ …
analyzed: jalābu jam

original: saṁsedajaṁ …
analyzed: saset ajam

original: opapātikaṁ yoniṁ upagantvā sabhāvavaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā opapātiko hoti, evaṁ kulavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: opapātikam yonim upagantvā sabhāva vaṇṇam vijahitvā opapātikaḥ hoti evam kula vasena sattānam gabbha avakkantī hoti

original: Kathaṁ āyācanavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti?
analyzed: katham āyācana vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Idha, mahārāja, kulaṁ hoti aputtakaṁ bahusāpateyyaṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ sīlavantaṁ kalyāṇadhammaṁ tapanissitaṁ, devaputto ca ussannakusalamūlo cavanadhammo hoti.
analyzed: idha mahā rāja kulam hoti aputtakam bahu sāpateyyam saddham pasannam sīlavantam kalyāṇa dhammam tapa nissita deva putto ca ussanna kusala mūlaḥ cavana dhammo hoti

original: Atha sakko devānamindo tassa kulassa anukampāya taṁ devaputtaṁ āyācati ‘paṇidhehi, mārisa, asukassa kulassa mahesiyā kucchin’ti.
analyzed: atha sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ tassa kulassa anukampāya tam deva puttam āyācati paṇidhehi mārisa asukassa kulassa mahesiyā kucchinti

original: So tassa āyācanahetu taṁ kulaṁ paṇidheti.
analyzed: saḥ tassa āyācana hetu tam kulam paṇidheti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, manussā puññakāmā samaṇaṁ manobhāvanīyaṁ āyācitvā gehaṁ upanenti, ayaṁ upagantvā sabbassa kulassa sukhāvaho bhavissatīti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja manussā puñña kāmā samaṇam manaḥ bhāvanīyam āyācitvā geham upanenti ayam upagantvā sabbassa kulassa sukha āvahaḥ bhavissati iti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, sakko devānamindo taṁ devaputtaṁ āyācitvā taṁ kulaṁ upaneti.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ tam deva puttam āyācitvā tam kulam upaneti

original: Evaṁ āyācanavasena sattānaṁ gabbhāvakkanti hoti.
analyzed: evam āyācana vasena sattānam gabbha avakkanti hoti

original: Sāmo, mahārāja, kumāro sakkena devānamindena āyācito pārikāya tāpasiyā kucchiṁ okkanto.
analyzed: sāmaḥ mahā rāja kumāraḥ sakkena devānamindena āyācitaḥ pārikāya tāpasiyā kucchim okkantaḥ

original: Sāmo, mahārāja, kumāro katapuñño, mātāpitaro sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā, āyācako sakko, tiṇṇaṁ cetopaṇidhiyā sāmo kumāro nibbatto.
analyzed: sāmaḥ mahā rāja kumāro kata puññaḥ mātā pitaro sīlavanto kalyāṇa dhammāḥ āyācako sakko tiṇṇam cetas paṇidhiyā sāmaḥ kumāro nibbatto

original: Idha, mahārāja, nayakusalo puriso sukaṭṭhe anūpakhette bījaṁ ropeyya, api nu tassa bījassa antarāyaṁ vivajjentassa vuḍḍhiyā koci antarāyo bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja naya kusalaḥ purisaḥ su kaṭṭhe anūpa khette bījam ropeyya api nu tassa bījassa antarāyam vivajjentassa vuḍḍhiyā koci antarāyaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, nirupaghātaṁ bījaṁ khippaṁ saṁviruheyyā”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante nirupaghātam bījam khippam sa viruheyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, sāmo kumāro mutto uppannantarāyehi tiṇṇaṁ cetopaṇidhiyā nibbatto.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sāmaḥ kumāraḥ muttaḥ uppanna antarāyehi tiṇṇam cetopaṇidhiyā nibbatto

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, sutapubbaṁ tayā isīnaṁ manopadosena iddho phīto mahājanapado sajano samucchinno”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja suta pubbam tayā isīnam manaḥ padosena iddhaḥ phītaḥ mahā janapadaḥ sa janaḥ samucchinnaḥ ti

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati

original: Mahiyā daṇḍakāraññaṁ majjhāraññaṁ kāliṅgāraññaṁ mātaṅgāraññaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ araññaṁ araññabhūtaṁ, sabbepete janapadā isīnaṁ manopadosena khayaṁ gatā”ti.
analyzed: mahiyāḥ daṇḍaka araññam majjha araññam kāliṅga araññam mātaṅga arañña sabbam tam araññam arañña bhūta sabbe ipa ete janapadāḥ isīnam manaḥ upadosena khayam gatā ati

original: “Yadi, mahārāja, tesaṁ manopadosena susamiddhā janapadā ucchijjanti, api nu kho tesaṁ manopasādena kiñci nibbatteyyā”ti?
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja tesam manaḥ padosena su samiddhāḥ janapadāḥ ucchijjanti api nu kho tesam manaḥ upasādena kiñci nibbatteyya ati

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, sāmo kumāro tiṇṇaṁ balavantānaṁ cetopasādena nibbatto isinimmito devanimmito puññanimmitoti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja sāmaḥ kumāraḥ tiṇṇam balavantānam cetopasādena nibbattaḥ isi nimmitaḥ deva nimmitaḥ puñña nimmitaḥ ti

original: Evametaṁ, mahārāja, dhārehi.
analyzed: evam eta mahā rāja dhārehi

original: Tayome, mahārāja, devaputtā sakkena devānamindena āyācitā kulaṁ uppannā.
analyzed: tayā ume mahā rāja deva puttā sakkena devānamindena āyācitā kulam uppannā

original: Katame tayo?
analyzed: katame tayaḥ

original: Sāmo kumāro mahāpanādo kusarājā, tayopete bodhisattā”ti.
analyzed: sāmaḥ kumāraḥ mahāpanādaḥ kusa rājā tayā upete bodhisattā ati

original: “Suniddiṭṭhā, bhante nāgasena, gabbhāvakkanti, sukathitaṁ kāraṇaṁ, andhakāro āloko kato, jaṭā vijaṭitā, nicchuddhā paravādā, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: su niddiṭṭhā bhante nāgasena gabbhāvakkanti su kathitam kāraṇa andhakāro āloko kataḥ jaṭā vijaṭitā nicchuddhā paravādā evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Gabbhāvakkantipañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: gabbhāvakkantipañhaḥ chaṭṭho
